article_title: State could trump Hobby Lobby decision
article_text: A group of Washington state senators hopes to prevent discrimination against women by employers who refuse to offer contraceptive coverage in their health-care plans. A bill they plan to introduce in the 2015 Legislature would overturn the effects of the U.S. Supreme Court’s Hobby Lobby decision in the state of Washington.

article_metadata.title: State could trump Hobby Lobby decision | The Olympian
